The Tim Hortons Coaches Clinic is back for another year at Canadian Tire Centre on Sunday, Oct. 29. Watch Guy Boucher and his coaching staff run through a Senators practice! In addition, the rest of the Sens coaching staff will be leading other speciality sessions as listed: 

Goaltending: Led by Sens goalie coach Pierre Groulx 
Skill Development: Led by Associate Coach Marc Crawford and Assistant Coach Martin Raymond
Effective Ice Utilization: Led by Brian Gillam of Hockey Eastern Ontario (HEO)
Defensive Zone Coverage: Led by Greg Kennedy of HEO 

Register for free today and check-in at the clinic to receive maintenance points towards Hockey Canada’s Coaching Certification program. Help shape the future of minor hockey today!
